_comment: V1.6.0: Scrape configuration for supplier websites. Pattern: 'direct' = single price, 'table' = tiered pricing. pricePath = custom URL path for price page.

_ignore_list._comment: Suppliers we will NOT add - do not contact or re-evaluate
_ignore_list.paragonoil.com: Not COD - requires account/contract. Serves NYC 5 boroughs + Westchester.
_ignore_list.huntingtondiscountoil.com: Dole Fuel Oil - no price found on site.
_ignore_list.affordablefuels.com: No phone number on site - cannot verify business.
_ignore_list.sosxtremecomfort.com: HVAC company - not primarily heating oil.
_ignore_list.getcodoil.com: BROKER — P.O. Box Woodside NY, no fleet, routes orders to local dealers. Deactivated in migration 075.
_ignore_list.onlinefuel.net: BROKER/AGGREGATOR — contracts with local fuel dealers. Not a direct supplier.
_ignore_list.fuelsnap.com: Aggregator marketplace — not a direct supplier. Was used for signal tracking.
_ignore_list.codfuel.com: Aggregator/broker — CT/NY/NJ/MA/RI. Not a direct supplier.
_ignore_list.cashheatingoil.com: Aggregator — NY/NJ/PA/CT. Not a direct supplier.
_ignore_list.heatingoilprices.com: Aggregator — regional pricing trends. Not a direct supplier.
_ignore_list.heatfleet.com: Aggregator — national dealer price comparison. Not a direct supplier.
_ignore_list.cheapestoil.com: Aggregator — Northeast price lists. Not a direct supplier.

_future_contract_oil._comment: Quality suppliers that are contract-only. Revisit if they add COD/will-call.
_future_contract_oil.deerparkoil.com: Deerpark Oil - Sparrowbush, NY. Full-service automatic delivery. Great tri-state coverage (Sullivan, Orange County NY; Pike County PA; Sussex County NJ). Phone: (845) 856-6565.
_future_contract_oil.gblossoil.com: G. Bloss Oil - Coopersburg/Quakertown, PA. Full-service automatic delivery. Bucks/Lehigh counties. Phone: (610) 282-1244.
_future_contract_oil.walkerfuels.com: Walker Fuels - Quakertown, PA. Full-service automatic delivery. Upper Bucks County. Phone: (215) 536-8712.
_future_contract_oil.allseasonsfuelllc.com: All Seasons Fuel - Quakertown, PA area. Contract-only delivery. Bucks County. Phone: (215) 529-5553.
_future_contract_oil.bucksrunoil.com: Bucks Run Oil - Hellertown, PA. Contract-only automatic delivery. Bucks/Northampton/Lehigh counties. Phone: (610) 838-7218.
_future_contract_oil.easternoilcompany.com: Eastern Oil Company - Peekskill, NY. Full-service automatic delivery + budget plans. Westchester/Putnam counties. Heating oil, kerosene, off-road diesel. Phone: (914) 737-1583.
_future_contract_oil.heritagefuel.com: Heritage Fuel - Croton Falls, NY. Full-service contract/automatic delivery. Westchester/Putnam/Dutchess counties. Heating oil, diesel, propane. Phone: (914) 277-8088.
_future_contract_oil.mtfuels.com: MT Fuel Corp - Stony Brook, NY. Full-service delivery. Suffolk/Nassau counties. Heating oil, diesel. Phone: (631) 828-9179.
_future_contract_oil.villageoilco.com: Village Oil Co (Santa Energy) - Ridgefield, CT. On-demand but prepay by card only (no COD). Fairfield County CT. Phone: (203) 431-6560.
